ssot__MessageEngagement__dlm.name: Message Engagement
ssot__MessageEngagement__dlm.description: The Message Engagement DMO represents a user's engagement with a marketing message.

ssot__AccountContactId__c.description: A reference ID for the account contact.

ssot__ActionCadenceStepId__c.description: A reference ID for the action cadence step.

ssot__CaseId__c.description: A reference ID for any recorded issue, such as a laptop connectivity problem

ssot__ContactPointId__c.description: A reference ID for the accounts’ contact point, for example, an address or social network handle.

ssot__CountryId__c.description: A reference ID to country dialing code for SMS phone number.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DeviceCountryId__c.description: The reference ID of the country where the device is located.

ssot__DeviceIPAddress__c.description: The IP address of the device.

ssot__DeviceLatitude__c.description: The geo latitude of the device when the engagement was recorded.

ssot__DeviceLocaleId__c.description: A reference ID for the user locale configured on the device.

ssot__DeviceLongitude__c.description: The geo longitude of the device when the engagement was recorded.

ssot__DevicePostalCode__c.description: The postal code associated with the device.

ssot__EngagementAssetId__c.description: A reference ID for the type of engagement asset.

ssot__EngagementChannelId__c.description: A reference ID for the engagement channel.

ssot__EngagementChannelActionId__c.description: A reference ID for the engagement action.

ssot__EngagementChannelTypeId__c.description: A reference ID for the engagement channel type.

ssot__EngagementDateTm__c.description: The date and time of engagement.

ssot__EngagementEventDirectionId__c.description: A reference ID for the engagement event direction, for example, inbound or outbound.

ssot__EngagementNotesTxt__c.description: The details about what transpired during the engagement.

ssot__EngagementNbr__c.description: A user-facing ID for an engagement.

ssot__EngagementPublicationId__c.description: A reference ID for a background process that generates volumes of emails, SMS, or other engagement types.

ssot__EngagementTypeId__c.description: A reference ID for one of the defined varieties of engagement, for example, an email or a phone engagement.

ssot__EngagementVehicleId__c.description: A reference ID for the vehicle through which the engagement was recorded.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__IndividualId__c.description: A reference ID to contact for account.

ssot__InternalEngagementActorId__c.description: A reference ID for an internal engagement actor that groups the different types of individuals who are targets of marketing engagements.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the data record.

ssot__IsTestSend__c.description: An indicator if the engagement record was generated as part of testing.

IsValid__c.description: An indicator if the engagement record is valid.

ssot__KeywordTxt__c.description: The short code keyword for the message.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LeadlId__c.description: A reference ID for a person or company that showed interest in the company's products.

ssot__LinkURL__c.description: The URL that was used to access a software application or web page.

ssot__MarketAudienceId__c.description: A reference ID to a market audience or the people you want to reach with marketing communication.

ssot__MarketJourneyActivityId__c.description: A reference ID for a step or activity that a customer configures in the Salesforce Journey Builder tool.

ssot__MarketSegmentId__c.description: A reference ID for a group of people who share one or more common characteristics, grouped for marketing purposes who are associated with this engagement.

ssot__MarketingEmailListId__c.description: A reference ID for a set of email addresses that is used for marketing communications.

ssot__MessageDeliveryShortCd__c.description: The short code used for the message delivery.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Message Engagement DMO.

ssot__Referrer__c.description: A container that stores contextual data about the user's usage of the site or the application that referred them to the software application that generated the engagement. For example, a campaign or search advertisement.

ssot__ReferrerURL__c.description: The URL of the application that the user was using before being directed to the Software Application that generated this Engagement.

ssot__SalesOrderId__c.description: A reference ID for the internal document generated by the seller.

ssot__SendClassificationId__c.description: A reference ID to how consent is checked, either transactional or commercial.

ssot__SentDateTm__c.description: The date and time when the publication or communication was sent.

ssot__SessionId__c.description: A reference ID for the session used to group related events together.

ssot__ShoppingCartId__c.description: A reference ID for the shopping cart for data captured from user actions such as adding and removing items from a shopping cart.

ssot__TargetEngagementActorId__c.description: A reference ID for how groups of individuals are targeted for marketing engagements, for example, leads.

ssot__TaskId__c.description: A reference ID that represents a business activity such as making a phone call or other to-do items.

ssot__WebCookieId__c.description: A reference ID for a small piece of data sent from a website and stored on the user's computer by the user's web browser while the user is browsing.

ssot__WorkflowId__c.description: A reference ID for a sequence of steps or processes in a software application through which a piece of work passes from initiation to completion.
